TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Process extends System.Object

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

Docs.remarks: Processes spawned with must use this method to ensure zombie processes are not stranded.
Pass this value to to ignore a pipe parameter.
Pass this value to to request a request a pipe descriptor be returned in the parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool SpawnAsync (string working_directory, string[] argv, string[] envp, GLib.SpawnFlags flags, GLib.SpawnChildSetupFunc child_setup, out GLib.Process child_process);

.method public static hidebysig bool SpawnAsync(string working_directory, string[] argv, string[] envp, valuetype GLib.SpawnFlags flags, class GLib.SpawnChildSetupFunc child_setup, class GLib.Process child_process) cil managed

Docs.param: The directory in which to execute the process, or to use the current directory of the parent process.
A string array containing the program name in the first element.
An array of environment values in the form 'var=value', or .
Process spawning configuration flags.
A child process setup callback, or .
Returns the child process.
Docs.returns: A boolean value indicating spawning success.

remarks.para: The method does not wait for the child process to complete before returning. This is a convenience method for the more detailed method. This method throws if an error occurs creating the process.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool SpawnAsyncWithPipes (string working_directory, string[] argv, string[] envp, GLib.SpawnFlags flags, GLib.SpawnChildSetupFunc child_setup, out GLib.Process child_process, ref int stdin, ref int stdout, ref int stderr);

.method public static hidebysig bool SpawnAsyncWithPipes(string working_directory, string[] argv, string[] envp, valuetype GLib.SpawnFlags flags, class GLib.SpawnChildSetupFunc child_setup, class GLib.Process child_process, int32 stdin, int32 stdout, int32 stderr) cil managed

Docs.param: The directory in which to execute the process, or to use the current directory of the parent process.
A string array containing the program name in the first element.
An array of environment values in the form 'var=value', or .
Process spawning configuration flags.
A child process setup callback, or .
Returns the spawned process.
Returns the stdin pipe descriptor if caller passes anything but .
Returns the stdout pipe descriptor if caller passes anything but .
Returns the stderr pipe descriptor if caller passes anything but .
Docs.summary: Spawns a child process and returns requested pipe descriptors.
Docs.returns: A boolean value indicating operation success.

remarks.para: This method throws if an error occurs creating the process.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool SpawnCommandLineAsync(string command_line) cil managed

Docs.param: The command line with arguments.
Docs.returns: A boolean value indicating spawning success.

remarks.para: This method does not wait for the child process to complete before returning. It is a convenience method for the more detailed method.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool SpawnCommandLineSync (string command_line, out string stdout, out string stderr, out int exit_status);
.method public static hidebysig bool SpawnCommandLineSync(string command_line, string stdout, string stderr, int32 exit_status) cil managed

Docs.param: The command line with arguments.
Returns the stdout output of the child process as a string.
Returns the stderr output of the child process as a string.
Returns the exit code returned by the process.
Docs.returns: A boolean value indicating spawning success.

remarks.para: The method waits for the child process to complete prior to returning. This is a convenience method for the more detailed method.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool SpawnSync (string working_directory, string[] argv, string[] envp, GLib.SpawnFlags flags, GLib.SpawnChildSetupFunc child_setup, out string stdout, out string stderr, out int exit_status);

Process spawning configuration flags.
A child process setup callback, or .
Returns the stdout output of the child process as a string.
Returns the stderr output of the child process as a string.
Returns the exit code of the child process.
